title: Podcast Episode 70.1 – CAPITOL SOUTH by Raine Miller
description:
Our audiobook this week is Capitol South by New York Times Bestselling Author Raine Miller!

Narrated by Elizabeth Hart and Curt BonnemThe descendants of two former US Presidents dance around the "plan" put into motion by their families that they marry and continue the bloodline of a powerful political dynasty. Reese Pinkarver and Grayson Lash are on a deadline with destiny...with no time to be distracted by something as troublesome as love.

NAKED by Raine Miller: https://amzn.to/38n1c7R

FILTHY RICH by Raine Miller: https://amzn.to/39zMVG4

The Romance Cover Market: www.theromancecovermarket.com

GIVEAWAY: http://readmeromance.com

Follow Read Me Romance on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/readmeromance/?hl=en

Join Read Me Romance Headquarters on FB: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1681258945313004/

Find Alexa Riley on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/authoralexariley/

Find Tessa Bailey on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tessabaileyisanauthor/

Podcast Credits
Read Me Romance Theme Song by L.B. Ballard
Podcast Production by Lola
